name: Reaper's Diary
description:
A reaper who doesn't want to be a reaper anymore tries to escape from the dungeon of the underworld. But on the way he encounters many obstacles... can he survive 50 days?  But watch out: you don't have infinite time. Sooner or later your disappearance will be noticed ...

This is my first game :D 

Assets:

  • https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-dungeon-tileset
  • https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii

There are only 7 levels so far - I'll add more in the future
